about_the_game:
Devin Night Token Pack: Tome of Beasts Pack 4 - Eleinomae-Goatman


Pack four from Kobold Press's Tome of Beast book.

This token pack includes:

  • Eleinomae
  • Elemental Loci
  • Emerald Eye
  • Empty Cloak
  • Enchantress
  • Eonic Drifter
  • Erina
  • Far Darrig
  • Fate Eater
  • Fear Smith
  • Fell Forged
  • Fext
  • Fey Duelist
  • Fey Guardian
  • 2 Fey Lord Bearkings
  • Fey Lord Of Hunting
  • Fey Lord Moonlit King
  • Fey Lord Night Queen
  • Fey Lord Riverking
  • Fey Lord Snow Queen
  • Fey Lord Witch Queen
  • Feyward Tree
  • Firebird
  • Firegeist
  • Flutterflesh
  • Folk of Ling
  • Forest Marauder
  • Forest Hunter
  • Fraughashar
  • Frostveil
  • Garroter Crab
  • Gbahali
  • Gearforged Templar
  • Genie Al-Aeshama
  • Gerridae
  • Ghoul Beggar
  • Ghoul Bonepowder
  • Ghoul Darakhul
  • Ghoul Emperor
  • Ghoul Imperial
  • Ghoul Iron
  • 3 Giants Desert
  • Giant Flab
  • Giant Hraesvelgr
  • Giant Jotun
  • Giant Thursir
  • Glass Gator
  • Gnarljak
  • Gnoll Havokrunner
  • Goatman

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on July 10, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.5 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
